title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  AIP client and scanner data surfaced in Content explorer
description:
,All files detected by the AIP_Onprem_scanner via the 'Discover' event will be showcased in the Content explorer under two new on-premises locations: File Share and SharePoint Server.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/data-classification-content-explorer?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
